name: Minimal Change Principle
description: Make targeted, minimal changes to existing code
principles: CHANGE ONLY WHAT'S NECESSARY - No refactoring during bug fixes
UNDERSTAND BEFORE CHANGING - Review impact first
PRESERVE EXISTING BEHAVIOR - Unless explicitly changing it
ONE CONCERN PER CHANGE - Don't mix unrelated changes
TEST AFTER EVERY CHANGE - Verify nothing broke
DOCUMENT WHY - Explain the reason for change

change_workflow.step_1: Understand current code and its purpose

guidelines.scope: Change only files directly related to the task
guidelines.testing: Add tests for new behavior, verify existing tests pass
